nodes.text: The Ears of the Chiroptix was a Nightsister spell that gave the user increased hearing capabilities. It allowed to hear "whispers" and to, in essence, see with sound by painting pictures of hidden places from the sounds emanating from those places.
This technique was allowed during the Nightsister's Test of Night. The name originated from the chiroptix, a creature from Dathomir with a keen sense of hearing.
The Ears of the Chiroptix technique shares similarities with the animal echolocation—the use of echoes to detect objects as observed in bats and other natural creatures.
